# mapItemDetailViewControllerDidFinish(_:)

**Instance Method**

Informs the delegate when a person dismissed the view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func mapItemDetailViewControllerDidFinish(_ detailViewController: MKMapItemDetailViewController)
```

## Parameters

- **detailViewController**: The dismissed view controller.
